scripts.build: yarn workspace root.drio build && yarn workspace saas.drio build && yarn workspace sc-events-generator build
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio dev" "yarn workspace saas.drio dev" "yarn workspace sc-events-generator dev"
scripts.serve: concurrently "yarn workspace root.drio start" "yarn workspace saas.drio start" "yarn workspace sc-events-generator start"
